The proportion of retrotransposons and DNA transposons activated in Mp
different from that of the entire genome. However, the proportion of long interspersed nuclear
elements (LINE) was very low in Mp
mutants compared to that of the entire genome.
Genome-wide DNA methylation status in Mp
To reveal the function of Mp
in DNA methylation, we performed genome-wide DNA
methylation analysis using bisulfite-sequencing (BS-seq). Two genomic DNA samples extracted
gametophytes (Tak-1_rep2) were treated with sodium bisulfite and analyzed by deep-sequencing
(Table 1). We also included in the analysis the previously published BS-seq data of
was decreased to around 0.5%, compared to Tak-1 (around 2.7%). On the other hand, non-CG
methylation was dramatically increased in Mp
compared to Tak-1 at both CHG and CHH
